channel.title: Single Cell on
channel.description: Recent content in Single Cell on

item.title: Awsome single cell RNA-seq clustering
item.author: zqzneptune@hotmail.com (Qingzhou Zhang)
item.description: Introduction Recently developed single cell RNA sequencing technologies are revolutionizing our understanding of cellular functions. Massive parallel sequencing of thousands of cells has provided the research community a window into the transcriptional landscape of living organisms. In the meantime, great challenges have been posed due to the large volume and complexity of the data. Therefore, algorithms, as well as their software applications, have been developed to help investigate biological meaningful information.
